English.Text: Every right to a little joke. "These claw marks!" the naturalist feigns horror. "Is it something terrible?!" asks a fearful sailor. But the naturalist can bite tongue no longer, and succumbs to laughter; "No! Good heavens. We have a mother and kittens aboard!" The cat family is found in a barrel, which, it is agreed, shall serve as their home for the duration. The crew dote on the little rascals, their presence a great comfort.
